{{Disambiguation}}

'''Application programming interface''' ('''API''') may refer to several software [[w:Interface (computing)|interface]]s for game customization, online services, and more:

== ''Minecraft'' ==
* [[Script API]] &ndash; the JavaScript API used to interact with the game in {{BE}}.
* [[Mojang API]] &ndash; ''Minecraft'' online services for {{JE}}, used for game authentication, [[player]] profile query, [[skin]] retrieval, and etc.
* [[Microsoft authentication]] &ndash; Microsoft online services for {{JE}} and {{BE}}, used for {{w|Xbox}} account authentication, game ownership, and etc.
